content: clean modern lines and bags of texture make toby one of my favourite blankets i ve knitted to date i ve combined seed garter and stockinette stitch in stripes of varying thickness to give a blanket that s great for an adventurous beginner wanting to practice the skills they ve learnt or a more experienced knitter looking for a soothing easy knit my instructions produce a blanket approximately 60cm x 80cm but instructions for adjusting size are included in the pattern
